text: Configuring your CNS Mail on your PC (Windows 10)

steps.text:
Open a web browser and go to the following URL:

⇒ https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/
Click ❶ 'FREE DOWNLOAD.'
Your download will begin automatically. Next, ❶ open the file you just downloaded.
Confirm ❶ 'Standard' is checked and click ❷ 'Next >.'
Installation of Thunderbird is now finished. You can now continue and setup access to your CNS mail account. Check ❶ 'Launch Mozilla Thunderbird now' and click ❷ 'Finish.'

Type your full name in ❶ 'Your name' and '[your CNS login name]@sfc.keio.ac.jp' in ❷ 'Email address.' Type your IMAP/SMTP-AUTH password in ❸ 'Password.'

You can create and change your CNS IMAP password at the following URL: ⇒ https://itcsecure.sfc.keio.ac.jp/form/password/

Thunderbird will start searching for your email account, wait until you see the message 'Configuration found at email provider.' If the message is displayed, click ❶ 'Done'.
If the message is not displayed, click 'Cancel' and then click 'Confi gure manually...'

If you see a window like at the left, type the following incoming and outgoing mail server information into the settings window as shown.


Once you have entered all the settings, click ❸ 'Re-test.' After Thunderbird confirms the mail server information, click ❹ 'Done.'

If such window shown in the image on the left appears, click ❶ 'Set as Default.'

Configuring Your CNS Mail on Your PC (Windows 10) is completed.
